ygData.subject: Re: Magical Gloves...
ygData.msgSnippet: they look out of place, they look better holding a skull and a sapphire while blowing up stuff with their extra mana given from items ... From: Frank_the_Shank
ygData.messageBody:
they look out of place, they look better holding a skull and a sapphire
while blowing up stuff with their extra mana given from items

From: Frank_the_Shank . <privateryan8@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>

Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Magical Gloves...

nature,
